meanings.def: very beautiful and attractive; giving great pleasure
examples: gorgeous weather (= warm and with a lot of sun)
She looked stunningly beautiful that night.
She’s got a very pretty face.
He was described as ‘tall, dark and handsome’.
She looked particularly lovely that night.
She arrived with a very good-looking man.
He's just started going out with this really gorgeous girl.
exotic birds with feathers of gorgeous colours
